Delicious! Wow reviews were right this place has great food! Pasta was amazing and dessert was great too! Daily menu serving what is fresh. We were lucky to get seated without a reservation right at opening however the place is pretty small so a reservation would be wise. We tried four dishes, lasagna, pesto, balonaise, and tomato base with fresh mozzarella. My favorite was the tomato base, light but flavorful. I had a gnocchi like pasta with it and it was awesome!
